snippet: A sister of the Boston Marathon bombing suspects Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev appeared in a South Boston district court Wednesday to address an outstanding warrant.
abstract: Ailina Tsarnaeva, sister of Boston Marathon bombing suspects Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, appears in South Boston court to address an outstanding warrant for her arrest on a charge that she misled an investigator looking into the passing of a counterfeit bill.
lead_paragraph: A sister of the Boston Marathon bombing suspects Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev appeared in a South Boston district court Wednesday to address an outstanding warrant.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Bomb Suspects’ Sister in Court
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bomb Suspects’ Sister In Court
